评论详情: But the corners come up.  Have it taped down, so it looks very nice.  Wears well also.

This was the second rug I ordered with the same price range. First one I had to return because it was so bad. This one is perfect! For the price you can’t beat it. Looks amazing, apparently it’s machine washable. If you are on a budget order from them!

Its a decent rug for the price. Had trouble with corners curling up but got some carpet tape and it did the trick. Would recommend for an inexpensive rug. The pattern is nice and its easy to vacuum. Its is NOT plush, similar to indoor outdoor carpet.

Although the pic doesn't show very much of the rug, the colors in this are gray and yellow. Paired with the yellow chairs, it was perfect. Neutral but with color pops. Good quality and feel. No weird smells, rolled out nicely.

This is one of the best rugs I've purchased in awhile. It is stylish, looks good with about any decor and is easy to vacuum and spot clean. It only took a few hours to completely flatten out once unrolled. I'm replacing my other rugs with this one.
This rug fit nicely in the room selected for it.
Good quality. Very pretty
Love the color and the thickness! Amazing quality for a good price.
I purchased for entance foyer, Like the suttle colors. Easy to clean and with rug tape stays in place.
It's beautiful and soft and hold up in the hallway where we have a lot of foot traffic. It's a very light color but matches perfectly with the grey we have. It's so nice looking

I bought this rug as a teacher's gift for my friend's new classroom and it is SO adorable looking! It's colorful enough while also not being too overwhelming. It gives a nice calming yet child friendly vibe in the classroom. She paired this rug with felt circles to put on each child's sitting placement.

Does the job. Very affordable and looks sharp and neutral. It will certainly do for my high traffic hallway with crazy children running around. Not sure how it would suit someone with more expensive taste though.

The rug has not fully flattened I tried everything n it is getting worse I believe this one is defective I would like a new one in return. I am n have been a loyal customer n would appreciate it if u could help me out please n thank you
Makes my living room pop! I wanted something to bring all my colors together and this did it

评论概述: Very nice thin rugs good quality

评论详情: A bit of a more gray tone than I realized but still a fun pop of color for the house. Nice texture, easy to vacuum
Great buy

Length is perfect for the area in the kitchen I picked in front of the counter with the sink and coffee station. Looks great love the print/color; no problems so far did have some spills that cleaned up quickly and easily. Very nice rug would recommend to family and friends.

We got this rug for our twins nursery and have had this rug enrolled for over 4 months now. The color meets expectations /matches online images. The rug is soft. However no matter what we do the rug will not lay flat. The corner we walk over curls up and trips us (not matter how many times we roll/fold it the opposite direction) and despite putting the edges under furniture the rug seems to ripple and wrinkle causing more tripping hazards.  It almost seems to stretch out of place.
This rug peels each time I vacuum.
It’s good, bright, vibrant.
Perfect rugs for my hallway

评论概述: Very thin and not that colorful
评论详情: I was expecting there to be a little bit more cushion to these then I got. Also, the colors are not vibrant at all. They’re more muted. I’m definitely not happy.
Love this rug. Color is as described. Super soft!
Attractive, soft, lays flat in less than a day. Comes rolled up, so no creases.
Cute, but not my favorite purchase. Wrinkles easily and it’s hard to keep flat even with the tape on the corners.

I’m a little disappointed. I was excited to get it but it’s not cut  straight on one side and visible with a naked eye. I’ve try to reach out to customer support but no luck. Also its 3/4" narrower than supposed to be, which for a 2 feet wide runner is quite a bit.
Love the colors, soft enough under feet. So far holding up well and we are hard on things in our house.

评论概述: Comes creased but a steamer took them right out
评论详情: Looks good for the money. And doesn't get caught up in the robot vacuum. I did add anti slip pads to it cause it was slick on my lvp flooring
The rug is cute and looks exactly to the picture however, I ordered mine to be 7ft long and it's 5ft long. That was disappointing otherwise I'd if given it a 5 star
The color is not the same gray as shown and the quality of the rug is thin and cheap. I wish I had not opened the rug or I would of sent it back. It’s looks very cheap
It pairs really well with my blue sofa. Love it. Vacuumed daily.
Our runner for the hallway- just as pictures
The rug is not equally cut on both sides.  One end of rug os skinnier than other end
Never will lay flat. Cheaply made. Don't waste your time.
I am pleased to say that the item is of good quality and meets my expectations perfectly!

评论概述: Has All The Qualities You Could Ask For!
评论详情: When I’m cleaning the house, one of the most important aspects of any rug is if it stays stationary when I vacuum it (we have LVP flooring). This one definitely does!! And it pulls my remodeled laundry room together so well. This is an entryway for us into the house, so the laundry room gets a good bit of dirt tracked in. This rug cleans up nice as well!
Love the rug.  Materials used smell so bad, like gasoline.  Air’d it outside for over 2 solid weeks.  Next step is to scrub it.
The rug is okay looking but it will not lay flat it's very disappointing I would not recommend.
Perfect little rug for my office! So cute and perfect aesthetic!
We decided to clean a spot on the rug and once it dried it will not lay flat.
It is shorter than the previous one which I bought! That’s why I put 1 star only. I needed exactly the same size that it will fit to my hallway when I attached them together.
I am so happy with this rug!

评论概述: Pretty, easy to clean, doesn't show wear-Perfect
评论详情: It's colorful, but not loud. Thick but not bulky. Soft enough but not flimsy. It's a perfect mid level, every day use rug.  It does take work to lay it flat. Get rug corner grips and it's fine.
The length is perfect however an inch short in width. However, I am keeping it because I love the colors. It just leaves the walkway a little lacking.
This is so cute with my gray couch in my living room. Easy to vacuum. Love the design!

We purchased this to use as a runner in our kitchen, and this one is perfect! It is soft, but not fluffy, and so far we haven't had any trouble keeping it white despite it being in the kitchen and constantly walked on by two people and two big dogs. We haven't had to try to remove any actual stains yet, but we were able to get small amounts of dirt/mud tracked in by the dogs off of it pretty easily.

评论用户: Very nice, as described and fast shipping.
评论详情: Love the rug. Very well made.
Nice looking rug for the price
Very nice and beautiful.  Love the way it feels
Love the colors, they are vibrant but not overbearing. We used it at flooring for an indoor house and it's the perfect size!

I really did not expect it to look exactly like the picture, even tho it is not the highest of quality, for the price and size, I was very pleasantly surprised! Very happy! This is the fourth rug I have ordered from other sites and none of them looked like they picture. This is a 9.5/10
Love the rug, but was delivered wet which made it stink! Had to shampoo before using
Bought this to put over part of our new hard wood flooring. Looks great. It relaxed in just a few days and lays flat. The color is true to the pictures of it. Happy with my purchase.
Perfect for a kid play area. They design and colors are great.
Cheap quality the ends are rolled up won’t lie flat just not worth the money

This rug is in my bedroom and a low traffic area. I loved the rug before it started to unravel in three spots. This have been down for two weeks and it already has started to unravel in three different spots. Would not buy this brand again. Poor quality.
It’s my 2nd time buying this. Love how bright it is and also easy to clean with rug cleaner.

Enjoying rug for about 7-8 months now! Great color & geometric print! Made a great addition to our living room! Our 2 active dogs run, play & sleep on rug! We have had zero issues with stains, wear or tear! Highly recommend!
It was not the quality I thought it was.  Very thin, can’t get the crinkles out of it! Very much dis-satisfied.

Binding is separated from the rug & the rug pattern doesn’t even go to the end. Contacted the company directly, they boast 24 hour support, nobody has responded. Amazon won’t let me return it except in its original packaging which was plastic wrap I had to destroy to open it. Feeling totally ripped off!!!!!!
I mean it’s. Pretty rug but there’s PINK threading that you can see on the rug. Why pink? Bright magenta pink, on a white and grey rug. It’s quite the eye sore. Not too happy about that.

When I first saw the rug I was very excited. Then not so much. There are numerous areas completely missing the pattern. I have not contacted customer service yet, so I cannot comment on that, but I'm guessing this is a get what you paid for item and the price was fair.

评论概述: Buy a non slip grip rug for under it
评论详情: Looks great. Took a bit to get the corners to stay down. Highly recommend buying a non slip grip rug under it as it slips and easily slides from under you
I love the color, easy ro clean and easy to use.
Carpet came stained with green paint and mud. Not brand new :(
The color and durability is amazing.  I did find that getting it to lay flat was problematic at first.
Super thin. Slid around hard floor. Pointless for entry way. Returned.
Not the plushest rug, but very pretty and seems to be of good quality.
Nice carpet for the price. Pretty colors and patterns.  But the corners roll up and can’t get the carpet to lay flat.

I wasn’t sure about the quality (synthetic), but it is, actually, very pleasant under bare feet. The colors are perfect for our living room theme, and the size is exactly the length of the sliding door. One of the reasons I went with this brand is that they ROLL the rugs for shipping, not fold. So glad someone in shipping understands rugs enough to actually roll them - thank you so very much! I saw the reviews and pictures of folded rugs… OUCH. Also, I did get corner stickers, but didn’t use them after all. I rolled mine in the opposite direction (outside-in) and taped it tightly for just a couple of hours - the corners now are sufficiently flat, and I know to leave “good enough” alone. It probably would slip and require a non-skid pad underneath if I didn’t have 3 heavy plants stands on it, which, thanks to low-ish pile, are very stable. Our kittens also approve of the plushness and are “asking” for a bigger one for the living room. Love it and highly recommend it!
Great bright color! Very soft! Lay it out for a day or two upside down with something heavy and the wrinkles go away! Worth the money!
Yellow can be a tricky color  to coordinate. This rug would literally go with everything!

I love how it looks! But it has such an odd smell to it! Stunk up the whole basement. Hanging it outside for a week didn’t help, so I hosed and scrubbed it outside, helped a bit…. but still not great!! Ugh
Good for the money, it makes the room look nice. Cleans well. Up close you can see it’s not quality material, a little too synthetic looking for me but again, it’s a good price.

I just laid it out but it doesn’t require much flattening . The colors are great and although it’s thin it’s pretty soft . Overall, very happy with it . Inexpensive. Until I’m ready to pull the trigger on a thick woven one , this will due.

I’ve had this rug in my spare bedroom since July and can not get the horrible chemical smell out of the rug. It looks cute but the smell is overwhelming and overpowering. If I could get rid of it I would. Thought the smell would be gone by now.
It hasn't rained yet, so the drying out time is yet to be seen. But the rug is adorable and perfect with my gray deck furniture! It lays flat and is very soft! Excited to see how it holds up outside!
It is really big, wao!  This was a really good buy.  I like the designs on it.  I am happy with it.
Very pretty rug runner for the hallway It thin but lays flat & easy to vacuum
I used the rug for our dining room. It’s affordable price and looks pretty decent.

I was disappointed in this rug. I do love the design but this is a very lightweight rug. It moves easily and it’s not good for a high traffic area. It’s also very stiff and has ripples in it from being rolled and the edges never fall flat which makes sense bc it has no weight to it. Would not buy again.
Returned very longtime
Beautiful pattern, so soft, and tight pattern weave. My only gripe is that one corner won’t lay flat no matter what I do.
Great rug for a bedroom or living room. Quality is really good. Soft but not plush as the threads are short. Love it!
So cute
Love
We r moving into a new house. These rugs are wonderful. I ended up ordering two. 100%recommend.  Excuse the mess we r still unpacking.
The material is soft under foot, calming grays and it fits our space perfectly
Great design and soft. It did take a long time for it to finally flatten, but it looks classy in my space. Maybe not good for high traffic areas since it’s white and hard to clean
This rug is even better looking in person. Elevates the feel of my living room.
The carpet is nice and soft, colors match the pictures and it looks great in the room
Had for 3 plus months, corners never laid flat and I tried all the "tricks".
I would not sue this for high traffic. The design was ok but super thin and I tried everything to straighten out. Not soft but stiff. I use it in garage now bc I didn't feel like returning it.

I have been holding off and saving my money for the perfect rug and I finally found it. The smell is very mild and it opened up very easily. The only part that’s giving us an issue is one side which we blue taped to the floor and currently have ice cubes on it.

评论概述: Not as colorful as the photo
评论详情: It’s a nice rug, but I bought it because it has pretty colors.  The colors are maybe half as intense as shown. Very muted and somewhat boring. A miss.

Just as pictured. It looks more expensive than it is. It didn’t take too long to lay flat. Only thing is that it did have a strong odor. It’s dissipated after a few days. Just expect to air it out for a couple days after receiving it. I sprayed it a few times with fabreeze which I think helped. You will need some rug grippers for the bottom as well.

Really cute rug! Just understand it’s pretty thin. I ended up putting our old rug underneath it for some padding. My child spilt pop on it within a week and it came right out, didn’t even soak in! Great purchase!
Absolutely love my rug!!!
